description:
DIGITAL FUTURES / SWEETY HIGH MEDIA VP/DIRECTOR OF BRAND PARTNERSHIP

Job Title: VP/Director of Brand Partnership Marketing (DOE)

Agency Name: Digital Futures and Sweety High Media

Reports To: CEO + CCO

Direct Reports: Frank Simonetti and Veronica Zelle

Engagement Type: Full-Time

Location + Work Policy: Hybrid, Los Angeles

Company Overview

Sweety High Media is the culture-leading vertical media business serving the Gen Z audience. As a platform,

studio, growth agency and music business, we’re highly creative and differentiated in serving this critical niche.

We work with the top studios, labels, artists and brands to deliver authenticity and value to our end consumers in

an inclusive environment.

Role Overview

Sweety High Media is seeking an experienced marketing professional to join our Brand Marketing team. This Sr.

Director of Brand Marketing serves as the primary lead on all custom, cross-platform solutions and client

materials to support our growing media portfolio. This role is for a thought leader who can move between ideation,

collateral development, packaging, and pitching to onboarding clients and helping manage those high profile

relationships.

This is a position for an experienced and creative marketer. You will be responsible for supporting sales efforts

with a thorough understanding of Sweety High Media’s network portfolio. You will work closely with the CEO,

CCO, Production and Fulfillment teams to drive commercial success by balancing pricing, performance and brand

equity.

You will be a dynamic and thoughtful innovator who solves brand challenges by utilizing Sweety High Media’s

robust client solutions. We are looking for someone capable of developing in-house brand materials as well as

tailored campaigns for both agencies and brand-direct clients with thought-leading executions in entertainment,

CPG and adjacent market sectors.

Growth Path Roles

● VP, Brand Partnership Marketing

● SVP, Brand Marketing

Responsibilities

● Thorough understanding of Sweety High Media value proposition and market positioning

● Concept and craft custom brand campaigns through best-in-class proposals and presentations

● Collaborate with Editorial, and Production teams to identify, create and package new proactive programs

and sales opportunities

● Develop integrated advertising packages (content, creators, experiential) from ideation to formal or

informal response to proactive or reactive (RFP/RFI) needs

● Create research, media and marketing plans alongside proposal materials and socialize with clients

● Create and manage brand marketing materials, including case studies and sell sheets across Sweety High

Media and Digital Futures products

● Build Sweety High Media/Digital Futures capabilities presentations that showcase the Sweety High Media

story, audience insights, and creative solutions

● Oversee in-house data studies and project management

● Act as a key client liaison to help ensure campaigns are successful and oversee reporting

Requirements (Skills & Experience)

● 8+ years of digital marketing experience in Integrated Marketing, Client Solutions, and/or Creative

Services role for a B2C Publisher, media agency or brand

● Core Google Suite, Keynote, MS Excel, MS Word

● Experience executing strategy, content, talent and social media focused campaigns

● Knowledge of analytics reporting across Social Media platforms and Ad Manager

● Experience working across multiple stakeholders with the ability to articulate, aggregate and deliver on

key milestones

● Demonstrable track record of creating culture leading marketing and content programs, working with

designers, producers and clients that track to yield and margin.

● Strong creative and tactical mindset. Ability to think both in and out of the box as needed

● for clients with a knack for writing marketing copy

● Detail-oriented, thrive on multitasking and high performance

● Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with a taste for design and creative storytelling

● The ability to work independently and as a leader across multifunctional teams

● Experience with custom content, the creative economy and social growth

● Positive attitude, energetic and passionate about pop culture and the Gen Z media landscape

● Exceptional organizational and time-management skills
